table_description: Page Rules gives the ability to control how Cloudflare works on a URL or subdomain basis.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Specifies the status of the page rule.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: The time when the page rule is created.

columns.name: modified_on
columns.description: The time when the page rule was last modified.

columns.name: priority
columns.description: A number that indicates the preference for a page rule over another.

columns.name: actions
columns.description: A list of actions to perform if the targets of this rule match the request. Actions can redirect the url to another url or override settings (but not both).

columns.name: targets
columns.description: A list of targets to evaluate on a request.
